org.flixel.system.debug.WatchEntry

type
class
Helper class for the debugger overlay's Watch window. Handles the display and modification of game variables on the fly.

Constructor

public new(Y : Float, NameWidth : Float, ValueWidth : Float, Obj : Dynamic, Field : String, ?Custom : String)
Creates a new watch entry in the watch window.
Parameters:
Y - The initial height in the Watch window.
NameWidth - The initial width of the name field.
ValueWidth - The initial width of the value field.
Obj - The Object containing the variable we want to watch.
Field - The variable name we want to watch.
Custom - A custom display name (optional).

Instance Variables

private _blackText : nme.text.TextFormat

private _whiteText : nme.text.TextFormat

public custom : String

A custom display name for this object, if there is any.

public editing : Bool

Whether the entry is currently being edited or not.

public field : String

The member variable of that object.

public nameDisplay : nme.text.TextField

The Flash TextField object used to display this entry's name.

public object : Dynamic

The Object being watched.

public oldValue : Dynamic

The value of the field before it was edited.

public valueDisplay : nme.text.TextField

The Flash TextField object used to display and edit this entry's value.

Instance Methods

public cancel() : Void

Cancel the current edits and stop editing.

public destroy() : Void

Clean up memory.

private doneEditing() : Void

Helper function, switches the text field back to display mode.

public onKeyUp(FlashEvent : nme.events.KeyboardEvent) : Void

Check to see if Enter, Tab or Escape were just released. Enter or Tab submit the change, and Escape cancels it.
Parameters:
FlashEvent - Flash keyboard event.

public onMouseUp(FlashEvent : nme.events.MouseEvent) : Void

A watch entry was clicked, so flip into edit mode for that entry.
Parameters:
FlashEvent - Flash mouse event.

public setY(Y : Float) : Void

Set the watch window Y height of the Flash TextField objects.

public submit() : Void

Submit the current edits and stop editing.

public updateValue() : Bool

Update the variable value on display with the current in-game value.

public updateWidth(NameWidth : Float, ValueWidth : Float) : Void

Adjust the width of the Flash TextField objects.
